text: "Wichita Lineman" is a 1968 song by Glen Campbell. It is the title track to his 11th studio album Wichita Lineman. It went to number 1 in Canada and on the country charts in the United States and Canada, number 10 in New Zealand, number 15 in Australia and number 12 in Ireland. It went to be covered by numerous artists after its release. ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Country pop songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Glen Campbell songs Category:Restless Heart songs Category:Tom Jones (singer) songs Category:Johnny Mathis songs Category:Engelbert Humperdinck songs Category:Andy Williams songs Category:Smokey Robinson songs Category:Ray Charles songs Category:Guns N' Roses songs Category:Billy Joel songs Category:James Taylor songs Category:R.E.M. songs Category:Johnny Cash songs Category:Dwight Yoakam songs Category:Kool & the Gang songs
title: Wichita Lineman
